info.title: Warehouse Order and Task (A2X)
info.description:
In every API call, you can make use of the following operations:
 - You can retrieve warehouse orders and warehouse tasks with their serial numbers. Apply any of the filters provided or retrieve all existing data.
 - For existing warehouse orders, you can update the corresponding warehouse tasks.
 - You can update existing warehouse tasks (confirm, confirm with exceptions, confirm with serial numbers, cancel).
 - You can update existing warehouse orders (assign or unassign warehouse order to warehouse resource).
 - You can create warehouse tasks (product warehouse tasks, HU warehouse tasks, warehouse tasks for warehouse requests).

#

x-sap-shortText: Integrate external applications with warehouse orders and warehouse tasks with this synchronous inbound service

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET WarehouseOrder HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
